page.title: 10Salmon fishing on the Tay
page.content: If you own one of the residents'season permits or one of the day permits issued to visitors then you are permitted to fish trout or salmon on the Tay street side of the river from the 21st of January to the 21st of October.A day's fishing costs Â£8.00 while a season ticket only costs Â£5.00. With a permit you are entitled to fish for Salmon or Trout.You are prohibited from fishing on a Sunday,after sundown,or from the bridges.A major problem say the fishermen is pollution coming into the Tay from burns bringing insecticides from the fields.Autumn is the best time for Salmon fishing on the tay.The biggest fish caught recently on this stretch was 32lb in October of 1984.
